dmca.title: WomenToWomen asks removal of links
dmca.body:
1.	Allegedly infringed materials:

The copyrighted works at issue are following:
the article entitled "Suzanne Somers and bioidentical hormones" which was created on the 24th of March 2004 and can be found at http://www.womentowomen.com/LIBbioidenticalhormones.asp,
the text on the page http://www.womentowomen.com/howitworks.asp which was created on the 1st of December, 2003.
the text on the page http://www.womentowomen.com/symptoms.asp which was created on the 1st of December, 2003.

2.	Location of the material claimed to infringe copyright: The first page in this domain that is allegedly infringing our copyright is:

http://www.bioidenticalmedicaldictionary.com/faq.htm where the first section ("So are bioidentical hormones for you	question for yourself') is excerpted from our page http:///www.womentowomen.com/LIBbioidenticalhormones.asp and where the third section ("So how do we lose this.... Years also tends to peak in perimenopause") is excerpted from our page http://www.womentowomen.com/howitworks.asp

The second page in this domain that is allegedly infringing our copyright is:

http://www.bioidenticalmedicaldictionary.com/casestudy.htm where the text "Case study	very effective solution" is excerpted from our page http://www.womentowomen.com/LIBbioidenticalhormones.asp

The third page in this domain that is allegedly infringing our copyright is:

http://www.bioidenticalmedicaldictionarv.com/symptoms.htm where the text "What are your symptoms telling you	Personal Program report real improvement within weeks"
is excerpted from our page http://www.womentowomen.com/symptoms.asp and the text
"When your hormones are in balance	Lifestyle changes to help your body deal with
the demands you place on it" is excerpted from our page http://www.womentowomen.com/howitworks.asp.

The referenced infringements have been observed 29 August, 2005

3.	My contact information is as follows: 
Concordia Partners
[private], SEO manager
[private]@womentowomen.com
P: 207[private]
F: 207[private]
[private]
Portland, ME 04101 
United States

4.	The contact information of the allegedly infringing web page owner is as follows: 
[private], Next Wave LLC
[private]
Fitchburg, WI 53711
United States
P: [private]
F: [private]
[private]@tds.net

5.	I have good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
[private]
31 August 2005
